title: The Seer: The Seal of Solomon Prequel
features: No one knows precisely what Elian went through when he was young, but it feeds the death and destruction of his visions. Sixteen years old and the Seer of his generation, the survival of many rests on his shoulders. A war is coming and Elianâ€™s determination to stop it is the only hope left against the evil scourging the nine lands beyond the Gate.
description: Shannon Reber was born a long time ago in a galaxy far, far away-or her imagination was anyway. She lives in western New York with her husband and a wide variety of both real and imaginary friends who often battle it out for dominance in her head. Who needs yet another normal person in this messed up world? Read her books, or the evil overlord will take control of her mind!
